lines.text: I'm not being overly dramatic, Mr. Palmer, when I say the fate of the world is in your hands.
[Toasting his host at the strip club]
Here's to capitalism and big tits.
What do they say at Airport security? Is this your bag? Did you pack it yourself? Did anyone give you a present?
Are you in charge of this operation?
You're a bit young, aren't you?
You don't worry about my youth, and I won't worry about your age.
We were given your number by a friend.
Nice to know I have any.
Tell me Nick, have you got a mole on the left cheek of your ass?
Neither have I. We could be related.

[about to be thrown off a train at high speed]
You said you weren't a cruel man, Colonel. Can't we wait for a slow bit?

[after being thrown off a train at high speed with Harry]
"Can't we wait for a slow bit?" I can't believe you bloody said that!
